question_stem: If the patient does not have chronic pancreatitis, how will this affect the probability of Pancreatic neoplasm?
para_steps: The patient does not have chronic pancreatitis.|This affects the patient's immune and inflammatory responses.|This triggers downstream physiological changes.|This triggers downstream physiological changes.|This affects the probability of Pancreatic neoplasm.
cause_event: the patient does not have chronic pancreatitis

question_stem: If the patient has breastfed one of the patient's children for more than 9 months, how will this affect the probability of SLE?
